attributes.action: Raising the age of adult travel prices to 18 instead of 16.
attributes.additional_details: We are trying to raise the age of adult prices from 16 to 18. This is for our Active Citizenship project.

rejection.details: There have been many petitions calling for this, and to make it easier for visitors to find the petition they want to support, site moderators reject duplicate petitions (although sometimes some duplicates to get approved).  You can see the petitions that have been rejected, by looking at the 'rejected' tab.  As part of your project, you may wish to consider either (a) drafting a petition that is distinctively different from those that are currently live on the system; or (b) selecting a petition that is currently live and considering how you can encourage people to support it.
